Goal oriented, focused computer science engineering student with specialisation in AI and ML, with an eye for detail. I am a tech enthusiast who is skilled in python,C,C++ with Data Structures & algorithms and JavaScript with experience in Nodejs and I am trying to learn other programming languages such as C++, step by step. Besides these I am always keen to explore new technologies and work on different frameworks. I have a passion for apps with reactJS. Always working on my Data Structures & Algorithms skills and problem solving ability.
